bug.short_desc: Missing dependency texlive-lua-alt-getopt for package texlive-luaotfload-bin
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: One dependency is not installed automatically resulting in an error when running luaotfload-tool
Note that the bug's component should maybe be texlive-luaotfload-bin but bugzilla didn't offer this choice.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
How reproducible: every time
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Install texlive-luaotfload-bin 2. run $ luaotfload-tool --update
Actual results: This error message is printed /usr/bin/luaotfload-tool:190: module 'alt_getopt' not found: no field package.preload['alt_getopt'] [kpse lua searcher] file not found: 'alt_getopt' [kpse C searcher] file not found: 'alt_getopt'
Expected results: No error message
Additional info: Fixed by installing texlive-lua-alt-getopt

texlive-2016-24.20160520.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates.
